professional_summary: Highly skilled Oracle DBA specializing in single-instance OLTP database environments. Career objective is to utilize technical knowledge and skills as a Database Specialist, focusing on client relationships, requirement analysis, efficient solutions, and exceeding client needs.

work_experience.company: Robert Half Technology - New York, NY
key_responsibilities: Administered and supported Oracle 11g on Linux (RHEL/CentOS) and Windows platforms.
Configured Oracle software installation and database creation on File System and ASM.
Developed and tested backup and recovery strategies.
Performed software installation and configuration for database systems.
Resolved helpdesk tickets and ensured smooth operations.
